industry: Software Development, IT Services and IT Consulting, and Technology, Information and Internet
description:
Our client is a leading logistics and ecommerce company nationwide. They are seeking a Product Associate to join their team and help continue developing promotional and marketing tools for the sales team.

Requirements

  • Must be proficient with Excel
  • Able to use Functions (Vlook up, pivot tables, sum ifs, preferably macros)
  • Work 1-2 Saturdays a month (half day)

Location: Orange, Ca (onsite)

Salary: 65k-75k + up to 15% bonus and full comprehensive benefits
